artist: Designer: James H. Bowen; Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843–1950s
description: elephant on pedestal; one clown sitting on elephant; one clown below elephants trunk holding two rings; one clown at base of pedestal below elephant's tail balancing a ball on his feet
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on bottom incised: [ENG PAT JULY 28, / 1882 / US PAT AUG 8\' / 1882]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [#84.12 / Elephant and 3 Clowns on Tub / 69190 375 / 4380 / #88m]
title: "Elephant and Three Clowns on Tub" mechanical bank
